function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of monitoring of confirmed, probable, suspected cases, and close contacts of COVID-19","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of COVID-19 in the workplace","Mitigation":"Implement a system for monitoring and tracking COVID-19 cases and contacts, and ensure compliance with quarantine and isolation protocols","Technologies":"Occupational health monitoring software, contact tracing apps","People":"Workers, visitors, contractors in the offshore workplace","Owner":"Heads of related functions, occupational health department"},{"Description":"Inability to eliminate or substitute COVID-19 from the offshore workplace","Impact":"Continued risk of COVID-19 transmission and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement engineering controls, administrative controls, and PPE to reduce the risk of transmission","Technologies":"Engineering control systems, barrier materials, PPE","People":"Workers, visitors, contractors in the offshore workplace","Owner":"Health and safety department, facility management"},{"Description":"Failure to establish physical barriers and directions to control worker traffic in narrow areas","Impact":"Increased risk of close contact and transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Install physical barriers and signage to direct worker traffic and maintain physical distance in narrow areas","Technologies":"Strip curtains, plastic barriers, signage systems","People":"Workers, visitors, contractors in the offshore workplace","Owner":"Health and safety department, facility management"}]}
